duties_responsibilities.duty: Construct and implement software within an AWS environment (API, persistence, integrations)
Manage the full lifecycle of back-office application development; from designing, building, testing, deploying, to monitoring
Champion lean-Agile, DevOps principles and practices (e.g., CI/CD; you build it, you own it), and independent architecture, while supporting a culture of innovation and continuous learning
Perform technical tasks including estimating, analysis, technical requirements, design, construction and unit & integration testing following SDLC
Participate and enhance organizational initiatives by positively influencing and supporting change management and/or departmental/enterprise initiatives within assigned area(s) of responsibility.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in computer science or equivalent work experience (Master's preferred)
